english.segment1: How good it is to sing praises, how good it is to sing praises. How pleasant and fitting to praise him; how good it is to sing praise to our God. Praise the Lord, sing praises to our God. How pleasant and how fitting; praise the Lord. Sing praises to our God; how good it is to sing praise to our God. How good it is to sing praises, how good it is to sing praises. How pleasant and fitting to praise him; how good it is to sing praise to our God. Praise to the Lord, sing praises to our God. How pleasant and how fitting; praise the Lord. Sing praises to our God; how good it is to sing praise, how good it is to sing praise, how good it is to sing praise to our God.
